issue.title: [Python] Expose with_ modifiers on DataType
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8288](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8288). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have several `WithX` functions defined on `DataType` in C++ but only `WithMetadata` is yet exposed in Python. We should expose the rest of them.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8288?focusedCommentId=17071925) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6784
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6784>
